resources.string: Invalid USN. Check And Try Again.
You can close the app now. We\'ll get the result and notify you.

\t\tEnter your USN before results are published. We\'ll send you the results after they are available.\n\t\tVTU server responds poorly when the results are published. VTU Result Notifier is an Android app that aims to solve this problem. The app is determined to provide the result once you enter the USN. Gone are the days when you reloaded the page multiple times with frustration.

A notification will arrive when the result is available

Click on notification to view the result
